pages.text:
.entry-header
from humble beginnings:
We started with a simple dream, to create a place where everyone felt like they belonged, whether it’s a regular family gathering or a special occasion.
Our founder, chef Roberto Mejia, was born in Honduras and raised in Miami, Florida, with Spanish/Italian roots.
Chef Roberto has run kitchens in cities like Roatán, Honduras, Miami, Sarasota and now in Sebring FL.
Our Values
We strive to provide exceptional food, friendly service, and a comfortable atmosphere that makes every visit a memorable experience.
Credit Card Accepted
Apple Pay Accepted
Free Wireless Internet
Handicap Accessible
Military Discount
Senior Citizen Discount
FEATURES
Takeout, Seating, Parking Available, Free off-street parking, Television, Highchairs Available, Wheelchair Accessible, Serves Alcohol, Full Bar, Wine and Beer, Mastercard, Visa, Free Wifi, Discover, Accepts Credit Cards, Table Service, Family style, Non-smoking restaurant, Sports bar, Gift Cards Available.
Known for:
Free Wi-Fi
Happy hour drinks
Wheelchair accessible seating
Lunch Specials
Good for groups
Great cocktails
Kids eat free on Thursdays
Great liquor selection
Good for watching sports
Family friendly atmosphere
Popular with tourists
Catering
Curbside pickup
40 chef-made wing sauces
Testimonial
Bufalucca Sports N’ Wings features a casual atmosphere perfect for enjoying a laid-back meal.
What They Say About Us
Bufalucca is the place where you can bring your family and friends, sit back, watch the games, have a cold beer with our specialty wings.
Don't miss the chance to explore their variety of dipping sauces; it's a great way to enhance the wing experience.
Emma Odinson
Pay attention to special live music nights for an entertaining dining experience while enjoying your meal. Joann is noted as an exceptional server, so don't hesitate to ask for her when you visit.
Dian Annakin
Bufalucca Sports N' Wings features a casual atmosphere perfect for enjoying a laid-back meal.
Kyle Smith
The restaurant specializes in various chicken wings, alongside tasty sandwiches and seasoned fries.
Jean D. Johnson
They are known for their special deals on wings and friendly service, Bufalucca is a beloved local spot.
Aria Walker
American cuisine, bar, vegetarian friendly. From various diet-conscious menu items, Bufalucca Sports N’ Wings includes delicious vegetarian dietary options.
Thomas Doe
Reservation
Known for its special deals on wings and friendly service.
Bufalucca is a beloved local spot.
Telephone Reservations
863 304 8954
.entry-content .clear

.entry-header
Contact Us
So why wait? Come visit us today and experience the ultimate Chicken wings and sports destination in town!
Our Location
7429 US Hwy 27 N,
Sebring, FL 33870, USA
Discover the unique flavors of Bufalucca Sports N’ Wings, where the best wings, burgers, and beers meet the passion for sports. Explore our menu and experience it for yourself!
